title: SMC_SetCustomRampType (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_SetCustomRampType
Sets the ramp type of an axis to a new value.
In contrast to
SMC_SetRampType
, user-defined ramptypes (implementing
SMC_TG_IRAMPTYPE
) are possible.
Usually,
iRampType1
equals
iRampType2
.
Can only be used when the axis is in state
standstill
or
power_off
.
The FB executes synchronously on the rising edge of
bExecute
.
After the call, either
bDone
or
bError
are set.

rows:
The new ramp type for the first ramp of the trajectories,
usually the acceleration-phase.

The new ramp type for the second ramp of the trajectories,
usually the deceleration phase.
